question_text: If you had to choose between reducing economic inequality and protecting political freedom, which would you say is more important?
response_categories: 1 Reducing economic inequality is definitely more important / 2 Reducing economic inequality is somewhat more important / 3 Protecting political freedom is somewhat more important / 4 Protecting political freedom is definitely more important

question_text: Democratic systems are not effective at maintaining order and stability
response_categories: 1 Strongly agree / 2 Somewhat agree / 3 Somewhat agree / 4 Strongly disagree

question_text: Under a democratic system, the country endures poor economic performance
response_categories: 1 Strongly agree / 2 Somewhat agree / 3 Somewhat agree / 4 Strongly disagree

question_text: Democratic regimes are indecisive and full of problems
response_categories: 1 Strongly agree / 2 Somewhat agree / 3 Somewhat agree / 4 Strongly disagree

question_text: Democracy negatively affects social and ethical values in our country
response_categories: 1 Strongly agree / 2 Somewhat agree / 3 Somewhat agree / 4 Strongly disagree

question_text: Only one political party should be allowed to stand for election and hold office.
response_categories: 1 strongly approve / 2 approve / 3 disapprove / 4 strongly disapprove

question_text: We should get rid of parliament and elections and have a strong leader decide things.
response_categories: 1 strongly disapprove / 2 disapprove / 3 neither approve nor disapprove / 4 approve / 5 strongly approve

question_text: The army (military) should come in to govern the country
response_categories: 1 strongly approve / 2 approve / 3 disapprove / 4 strongly disapprove

question_text: Democracy may have its problems but it is still the best form of government
response_categories: 1 strongly agree / 2 agree / 3 disagree / 4 strongly disagree

question_text: The citizens in our country are not prepared for a democratic system
response_categories: 1 Strongly agree / 2 Somewhat agree / 3 Somewhat agree / 4 Strongly disagree

question_text: As long as a government can solve our country’s economic problem, it does not matter if it is democratic or not democratic.
response_categories: 1 Strongly agree / 2 Somewhat agree / 3 Somewhat agree / 4 Strongly disagree

question_text: Women should not be involved in politics as much as men.
response_categories: 1 Strongly agree / 2 Somewhat agree / 3 Somewhat agree / 4 Strongly disagree

question_text: The government should consult religious authorities when interpreting the laws.
response_categories: 1 Strongly agree / 2 Somewhat agree / 3 Somewhat agree / 4 Strongly disagree

question_text: People with little or no education should have as much say in politics as highly-educated people.
response_categories: 1 Strongly agree / 2 Somewhat agree / 3 Somewhat agree / 4 Strongly disagree

question_text: Government leaders are like the head of a family; we should all follow their decisions.
response_categories: 1 Strongly agree / 2 Somewhat agree / 3 Somewhat agree / 4 Strongly disagree

question_text: The government should decide whether certain ideas should be allowed to be discussed in society.
response_categories: 1 Strongly agree / 2 Somewhat agree / 3 Somewhat agree / 4 Strongly disagree

question_text: Harmony of the community will be disrupted if people organize lots of groups.
response_categories: 1 Strongly agree / 2 Somewhat agree / 3 Somewhat agree / 4 Strongly disagree

question_text: When judges decide important cases, they should accept the view of the executive branch.
response_categories: 1 Strongly agree / 2 Somewhat agree / 3 Somewhat agree / 4 Strongly disagree

question_text: If the government is constantly checked [i.e. monitored and supervised] by the legislature, it cannot possibly accomplish great things.
response_categories: 1 Strongly agree / 2 Somewhat agree / 3 Somewhat agree / 4 Strongly disagree

question_text: If we have political leaders who are morally upright, we can let them decide everything.
response_categories: 1 Strongly agree / 2 Somewhat agree / 3 Somewhat agree / 4 Strongly disagree

question_text: If people have too many different ways of thinking, society will be chaotic.
response_categories: 1 Strongly agree / 2 Somewhat agree / 3 Somewhat agree / 4 Strongly disagree
